problem.markdown:
>>1. The absolute speed of the magnetic field in space of a 3-phase rotor-fed IM is<< ( ) synchronous speed, Ns ( ) rotor speed, Nr (x) (Ns - Nr) ( ) Ns + Nr
>>2) A voltmeter gives 120 oscillations per minute when connected to the rotor of an IM. The stator frequency is 50 Hz. The slip of the motor is (a) (b) (c) 4% (d) 5%<< ( ) 2% ( ) 2.5% (x) 4% ( ) 5%
>>3) Semiclosed slots or totally enclosed slots are used in 3-phase induction motors, essentially to<< ( ) improve starting torque ( ) increase pull-out torque ( ) reduce magnetizing current and improve pf (x) increase efficiency
>>4) The rotor power output of 3-phase IM is 15 kW and corresponding slip is 4%. The rotor ohmic loss will be<< (x) 625 W ( ) 650 W ( ) 700 W ( ) 600 W
>>5) Which one of the following can be obtained by the equivalent circuit of an electrical machine?<< ( ) Temperature rise in the cores (x) Complete performance characteristics of the machine ( ) type of protection used in the machine ( ) Design parameters of the windings
